name: Puzzle Art: Horses
description:
Puzzle Art: Horses — minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with horses. The player's goal - puzzle pieces together to get a beautiful picture.
FEATURES:

- 50 levels
- Beautiful art design
- Achievements
- Relax music
- Peaceful puzzling atmosphere
- Hint tools to help solve puzzles
- There is no language barrier
